U

update() - Method in class IntoTheGalaxy.Alien
Overrides GameObject.update(), causes the alien to shoot and make dives, the dive action itself is implemented in the subclasses.
update() - Method in class IntoTheGalaxy.Button
Currently does nothing.
update() - Method in class IntoTheGalaxy.Fighter
Overrides GameObject.update(), keeps fighter within the screen, reduces delays over time.
update() - Method in class IntoTheGalaxy.IntoTheGalaxy
Overrides GameEngine.update(), increases the time attribute, spawns new Aliens if all are gone and there are more waves left to go, updates the dashboardtext, contains endGame().
update() - Method in class IntoTheGalaxy.Rocket
Overrides GameObject.update(), to remove rockets outside of the screen.
update() - Method in class IntoTheGalaxy.TextObject
Currently does nothing.
